import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { TodosContext } from '../contexts/TodosContext' import { ThemeContext } from '../contexts/ThemeContext' export default function Navbar() { const { dispatch } = useContext(TodosContext) const [search, setSearch] = useState('') const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch({ type: 'SEARCH_TODO', search }) setSearch('') } const { theme, setTheme } = useContext(ThemeContext) const mainColor = theme ? "light" : "dark" const background = theme ? "dark" : "light" return (
setTheme(!theme)}>Welcome
  • Home
  • Todos
  • Games
    Action Another action
    Something else here
setSearch(e.target.value)} />
) } {/* Home About Todos
setSearch(e.target.value)} />
*/}
